Room.Name: Level One Circular Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: This is the southeast area of the Tower Castle of Prince Rutger.
Room.LongDescription: There is an intersection with Apstone Tunnel farther to the north, while to the south you see a line of shops which serve the needs of the castle's inhabitants. Not far from here is a pawn shop, usually frequented by some of the younger and less well paid members of the castle's defense force.
